content.rendered:
Why Telemedicine?

Our doctors are now a phone call away. Simply call 08084632038 to schedule an appointment for a video/audio consultation.
More so, you can have your drugs delivered to you. 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾 St. Nicholas Hospital cares!

Telemedicine is a way for us to be available for our patients using modern technology, usually over the internet to deliver care from a distance. A doctor in any of our branches uses a telecommunications infrastructure to deliver care to patients from a remote location
